titleStmt.title: A case of conscience the greatest taht [sic] euer was, how a man may know, whether he be the son of God or no. Resolued by the vvord of God. Whereunto is added a briefe discourse, taken out of Hier. Zanchius.
titleStmt.author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
Zanchi, Girolamo, 1516-1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert VValde-graue, printer to the K. Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
